## Load Catalog

```{r}
#| label: hc_catalog
catalog_hc <- function() {
  fload("https://data.healthcare.gov/api/1/metastore/schemas/dataset/items?show-reference-ids") |> 
    as_tbl()
}

x <- catalog_hc()

x
```
